Sentencas: In this work, a novel integrated system based on a combination of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with compressed air energy storage (CAES) and turbocharger is presented for simultaneous production of domestic hot water and power in the scale of retail buildings for peak shaving applications.
Titulo: Thermo-environmental analysis of a novel cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and compressed air energy storage (CAES) coupled with turbocharger

Sentencas: The SOFC subsystem is the primary power generation unit, which is coupled with CAES and other supporting auxiliary cycles.
Titulo: Thermo-environmental analysis of a novel cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and compressed air energy storage (CAES) coupled with turbocharger

Sentencas: The energy, exergy, and emissions are quantified through parametric analysis for evaluating the overall system performance.
Titulo: Thermo-environmental analysis of a novel cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and compressed air energy storage (CAES) coupled with turbocharger

Sentencas: The preliminary results for the scenario analyzed indicate a power generation of 272 kW during 4 h in off-peak period, as well as a power generation of 407 kW during 7 h in peak demand periods.
Titulo: Thermo-environmental analysis of a novel cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and compressed air energy storage (CAES) coupled with turbocharger

Sentencas: The round trip energy and exergy efficiencies for the integrated system are 78% and 58%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermo-environmental analysis of a novel cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and compressed air energy storage (CAES) coupled with turbocharger

Sentencas: Also, the overall emissions of the proposed integrated system is reduced by 0.06 kgCO(2)/kWh in comparison to the standalone SOFC system.
Titulo: Thermo-environmental analysis of a novel cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and compressed air energy storage (CAES) coupled with turbocharger

Sentencas: The afterburner accounts for the main source of irreversibility and exergy destruction among all components.
Titulo: Thermo-environmental analysis of a novel cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and compressed air energy storage (CAES) coupled with turbocharger

Sentencas: Overall, the integrated system is superior to the standalone SOFC system from energy, exergy and emissions perspectives.
Titulo: Thermo-environmental analysis of a novel cogeneration system based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and compressed air energy storage (CAES) coupled with turbocharger
